{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Kpnetworks |model=KPWL-300 |fcc_date=02/22/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |type=enterprise access point |fcc_id=2AGR9KPWL0300 |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Annapurna Labs |cpu1_model=Alpine AL5140 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=SPI |fla2=128 |fla2_brand=Toshiba |fla2_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=3 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_module=Edimax EW-7955MAC |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Edimax EW-7944MAC |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9990 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier;Richwave;RTC6649E;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85405-11;;8; |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=KPWL-0300-XXXXXX_G, KPWL-0300-XXXXXX_A |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 5GHz 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''600Mbps''' - 4-stream 2.4GHz 802.11n device (256QAM)
{{TagLine|Enterprise Wireless Lan Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.kpnetworks.jp/product/}} (JP) "1246-01000174-50Z_ES" is silkscreened on the main board. :This device contains three 4x4:4 oversized mini PCIe modules but :the current embedded system template only allows us to capture two. *[[Edimax EW-7944MAC]]{{•}}4T4R 802.11an/ac{{•}}[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9990 :Likely used for dedicated backhaul among access points *[[Edimax EW-7955MAC]]{{•}}4T4R 802.11an/ac{{•}}[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 :Likely used for wireless AC clients (4x SKY85409 PAM) :"1244-00001046-50Z_ES" and "P/C=F64-113" is silkscreened on the black board. *[[Edimax EW-7955MN]]{{•}}4T4R 802.11bgn{{•}}[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 :Likely used for wireless N clients (2x Richwave RTC6649E PAM ??) :"1244-00001407-50Z_ES" and "1628" is silkscreened on the blue board. :The four antennas on the bottom are for the 5GHz backhual radio only. :The four antennas on the sides are for the 2.4GHz and 5GHz clients. [[Category:Fix Me!]]
